actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claw attacks and one Tail Slap attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) poison. Target incapacitated until the end of its next turn (DC 16 Con not incapacitated). If it fails the save by 5+ it is paralyzed instead.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 16 (2d12 +3) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 16 Str save or pushed up to 10 ft. away from the hag.

actions.name: Shriek (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a painful screeching in a 30' cone. Each creature in the area: 33 (6d10) thunder and is stunned until the end of its next turn (DC 16 Con half damage and isn't stunned).

actions.name: Denizens of the Deep (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magically calls 4 reef sharks 2 swarms of quippers or 1 Beast of up to CR 2 with swim speed. Arrive in 1d4 rounds act as hag allies obeying her spoken commands. Beasts stay 1 hr until hag dies or until hag dismisses them as bonus action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 16) no material components: At will: minor illusion  â€¢ 3/day ea: charm person major image1/day: control water

special_abilities.name: Polluted Aura
special_abilities.desc: Each creature in same water as hag and that starts its turn within 20' of hag: poisoned while within aura and for 1 min after it leaves (DC 16 Con not poisoned). A poisoned creature that starts its turn outside aura can re-save success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Skilled Submariner
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) and Wis (Survival) checks to find creatures and objects underwater. Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide while underwater.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Aquatic Creatures
special_abilities.desc: Communicate with Beasts and Monstrosities that have a swimming speed as if they shared a language.
